title: Tubolito PSENS smart inner tube measures pressure w/ NFC chip, plus world’s lightest gravel tube
content:
Not content with just producing the world’s lightest and strongest inner tubes, Tubolito is back with another world first – a smart inner tube. Coincidentally, it’s probably also the world’s most expensive inner tube at nearly $50 a pop. But it does have a pretty neat trick built into its thermoplastic elastomer skin. NFC Chips […]

The post Tubolito PSENS smart inner tube measures pressure w/ NFC chip, plus world’s lightest gravel tube appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
